Projects.title: My Projects

descriptions.portfolioWebsite: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 16, featuring dark/light theme toggle, smooth animations with Framer Motion, and optimized performance. Includes TypeScript for type safety and Tailwind CSS for styling.
descriptions.berichHub: Full-stack digital learning platform with user authentication, Profile pages, and Blog features. AI integration for personalized learning. Completely free and open-source. 4 different languages supported: English, German, Spanish, Swedish.
descriptions.llmAgent: Local ollama-based AI chatbot, customizable to use any LLM model, any Embed model, 2 Options for Vector DB; local postgres or DataStax Astra. Can read web pages, and answer questions based on the content. More coming soon.. Open source.
descriptions.subsApi: API for managing user subscriptions, including features for billing, invoicing, and payment processing. Built with Next.js and integrated with Stripe for secure payments.
descriptions.voiceToNotion: Transforms voice memos and meeting recordings into structured Notion pages with transcripts, summaries, and action items. Automates post-meeting admin work in under 30 seconds.
descriptions.aiEmailAutomation: An interactive demo using RAG to analyze emails, offering selectable answer options and tone-based rewriting. Illustrates a workflow that runs fully autonomously in production environments.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: How I handle your data and privacy

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: This privacy policy explains how this portfolio handles your data. I do not collect any personal data and prioritize your privacy.
overview.keyPointDescription: I don't collect, store, or sell your personal data. Everything is designed with privacy in mind.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Language preference and theme settings stored locally in your browser. Required for website functionality.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Privacy-friendly Vercel Analytics and Speed Insights to monitor website performance. No personal data is tracked or stored.

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.description: This website processes minimal data to provide functionality. All processing is done client-side in your browser or through privacy-compliant services.
dataProcessing.vercelDescription: These services collect anonymous performance metrics to help improve the website. No personal information is collected or stored.

chatbot.title: AI Chatbot Service
chatbot.description: This website includes an AI chatbot for interactive assistance and information.
chatbot.apiDescription: The chatbot is powered by Groq. By using the chatbot, you accept Groq's terms of service and privacy policy. Chat requests are processed via the Groq API.
chatbot.temporaryDescription: With your explicit consent, I may store chat conversations for quality improvement and analytics purposes. This includes: chat messages, timestamps, anonymized IP address, and general location (country/city). You can withdraw consent at any time. Without consent, all chat data remains in your browser only.

booking.title: Booking Service
booking.description: This website uses Calendly for appointment scheduling.
booking.calendlyDescription: When you book a call, your data (name, email, booking details) is processed by Calendly according to their privacy policy. I only receive the information necessary to conduct our meeting.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have full control over your data and privacy on this website:
rights.clearCookies: Clear your browser cookies anytime to reset preferences
rights.disableAnalytics: Use cookie banner to disable analytics tracking
rights.contact: Contact us if you have questions about your privacy

About.whatIDeliver: What You Get Working With Me

personalInfo.name: Yazan Abo-Ayash
personalInfo.title: I build fast, scalable web applications that help businesses grow

About.mainStory: I help SMEs and agencies launch web MVPs faster, automate repetitive workflows, and integrate AI assistants that save hours of manual work. My clients typically see results within 4-8 weeks â€” not months. Whether you need a customer portal, an internal tool, or a way to streamline your team's processes, I deliver solutions that are reliable, maintainable, and built to scale with your business.

sections.philosophy: I believe in clear communication, transparent timelines, and delivering exactly what was promised. No technical jargon, no scope creep â€” just reliable development with regular updates so you always know where your project stands. Every solution is built with your business goals in mind, not just technical requirements.

currentFocusItems: Workflow automation that saves hours weekly

PortfolioAbout.title: About This Portfolio
PortfolioAbout.description: This is not just a portfolio - this is my developer journey visualized into a full-stack application. It's not meant to be 'finished' because it evolves with me, growing and changing as I advance in my career. Built with enterprise-grade architecture and cutting-edge technologies, it will always be updated and will always grow.

Usecases.title: Use-Cases
Usecases.subtitle: Explore my collection of production-ready projects. Each showcases modern development practices and real-world applications.

project-1.title: Voice-to-Notion Automation
project-1.description: Transforms voice memos and meeting recordings into structured Notion pages with transcripts, summaries, and action items. Automates post-meeting admin work in under 30 seconds.
project-1.techStack: AI Voice Processing, Sentiment Analysis, Notion API, Next.js
project-1.implementationAreas: Agency Operations, Client Management, Executive Support

project-2.title: Automation ROI Calculator
project-2.description: An interactive tool designed to help businesses quantify the financial impact of automating manual workflows. It calculates annual burn rates, projected savings, and the break-even timeline in weeks, providing a clear visualization of cost-benefit analysis.
project-2.implementationAreas: Financial Analysis, Business Process Automation, Cost Optimization

project-3.title: AI Email Automation Demo
project-3.description: An interactive demo using RAG to analyze emails, offering selectable answer options and tone-based rewriting. Illustrates a workflow that runs fully autonomously in production environments.

rio.title: Automation ROI Calculator
rio.description: See exactly how much money manual tasks are costing your business.

results.burnRateDesc: You lose this every year doing it manually.
results.roiTimelineText: The automation pays for itself in just {weeks} weeks.
results.notProfitableDesc: Based on these numbers, manual work might be cheaper for now unless you scale up.

contextInput.title: Custom Context (RAG)
contextInput.infoText: Add custom context that the AI will use when analyzing or rewriting emails. This could include company policies, communication guidelines, project details, or any relevant background information.
contextInput.placeholder: Example: Our company policy is to respond within 24 hours. We offer 30-day money-back guarantees. The project deadline is March 15th...
